channel.title: Changing items in shops?
channel.description:
Well ive been messing around with private servers,but i got one question.How do i change the items in shops using p16 do i need to download some java pack ? or can i edit using scar and how ?
Thanks alot ,wow :)

item.title: Changing items in shops?
item.dc:creator: @infestor1 infestor1
item.description:
@infestor1 wrote:

For example, if you wanted to edit the falador general store…

You’d find it’s entry in shops.cfg:

Falador_General_Store				1	1	1931	5	1935	2	1735	2	1925	3	1923	2	1887	2	590	2	1755	2	2347	5	550	5

The things like 1931, 1935, 1735, those aren’t dates. :D. Those are item codes. Open up the moparscape client (webclient if you want, the one linked here. And on the top bar, go under help, to Item IDs. Then search up an item you want to add to your shop, and see the code to the right. It should be a 3 or 4 digit number. For example, if you wanted to add a white partyhat to a shop, you would need the code 1048.

Now, replace 1931 (a pot) with 1048 (white partyhat). Now, just save it, compile, and open up your client. Now go to the falador general store, and there will be a white partyhat in place of a pot.

To change the quantity, look at the number to the right of it. So the original number, 1931, now 1048. Next to it is 5. So originally there were 5 pots in stock, now there are 5 partyhats (rich general store :D). Change 5 to whatever number you want.

To change the shop name, change Falador_General_Store to your shops name. Spaces must be Underscores (_). If you want the shops name to be Bob’s Partyhat Shop, then change Falador_General_Store to Bobs_Partyhat_Shop.

Read full topic

@mod_taharok wrote:

You have to edit shops.cfg for changing items in shops, etc… You can edit shops.cfg using notepad or wordpad.
